snippet: Despite a well-documented increase in the abuse of alcohol and prescription medications among military personnel over the past decade, the Defense Department's strategies for screening, treating and preventing remains behind the times, a major new...
abstract: Despite a well-documented increase in the abuse of alcohol and prescription medications among military personnel over the past decade, the Defense Department's strategies for screening, treating and preventing remains behind the times, a major new report finds.

headline.main: Report Faults Military's Strategies on Drug and Alcohol Abuse
headline.print_headline: Report Urges Update of Military Substance Abuse Strategies

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
